data.title: Bank of Botswana: Assets: Reserves: Pula Fund
data.meta_description: Bank of Botswana: Assets: Reserves: Pula Fund data was reported at 53,821.340 BWP mn in Apr 2024. This records a decrease from the previous number of 55,118.017 BWP mn for Mar 2024. Bank of Botswana: Assets: Reserves: Pula Fund data is updated monthly, averaging 46,824.717 BWP mn (Median) from Jan 2003 to Apr 2024, with 256 observations. The data reached an all-time high of 64,391.355 BWP mn in May 2016 and a record low of 18,723.649 BWP mn in Apr 2003. Bank of Botswana: Assets: Reserves: Pula Fund data remains active status in CEIC and is reported by Bank of Botswana. The data is categorized under Global Database’s Botswana – Table BW.KB004: Balance Sheet: Bank of Botswana.
data.text: This website stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Cookies Policy.
